meanings.sent1: The tertiary color in the rainbow is green.

meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting education beyond secondary level.
meanings.sent1: The tertiary school offers advanced courses.

meanings.sent4: His tertiary goal was to excel in tertiary education.

meanings.definition: A member of a monastic third order.
meanings.sent1: She became a tertiary after years of dedication.
meanings.sent2: The tertiary devoted her life to serving others.
meanings.sent3: The tertiary monk had a mischievous twinkle in his eye.

meanings.sent5: The tertiary order welcomed new members with open arms.
